products.title: Scandi Ferns Linen Summer Roman Blind
products.description: Modern decor often calls for stark, tonal designs and minimalism, but this beautiful window dressing shows just how crisply contemporary a bright but simple palette can be. Bright white, sumptuously soft fabric is covered with a dense pattern of forest undergrowth thats colour modern decor often calls for stark, tonal designs and minimalism, but this beautiful window dressing shows just how crisply contemporary a bright but simple palette can be.

products.title: Scandi Ferns Linen Winter Roman Blind
products.description: Blue is always a cooling, calming colour, but in the scandi ferns linen winter roman blind it takes on a certain vibrance, even warmth, thanks to its dense leafy pattern. products.title: Scandi Birds, Capri - Roman Blind
products.description: A fun yet sophisticated take on the scandi birds design, the sweet capri features adorable birds in a two-toned blue, sat neatly on an oatmeal base. The pretty detailing on the creatures adds playfulness and personality, leading to a cute and characterful window covering. For a serious home office, with a hint of fun, hang the capri against white or matching oatmeal walls. The blue will encourage a studious feel to the room, whilst the bird illustrations portray sweetness and a recreational element.

products.title: Scandi Birds, Aqua - Roman Blind
products.description: A gorgeously fresh design, the scandi birds aqua has a softly energetic appearance, rooted in its contrasting shades of light oatmeal and vibrant aqua blue. The featured birds are sweet and characterful, covered in pretty detailing that adds to the attractiveness of this blind. Bring a quick punch of colour to a neutral hallway or upstairs landing by adding the aqua. Surround it with white walls and accessories in matching oatmeal shades, keeping the scheme light and airy for the perfect welcome.

products.title: Scandi Birds, Scarlet - Roman Blind
products.description: Perhaps the most mature of the scandi birds range, the scarlet presents its simply shaped birds this time in a deep ruby shade, with a lighter, tonal shade incorporated. The background is a soft oatmeal cream, which provides the ideal canvas for this standout design. Think cosiness and warmth with a contemporary twist in your living room, and encompass the scarlet with matching cream walls and plenty of warm reds throughout the room, using throws, cushions, and wall art to display the rich hues.

products.title: Choices Scandi Ferns Linen Ocean Roller Blind
products.description: Cool tones like blue dont have to be a downer, as this beautifully bright roller blind proves perfectly. The crispness of the tight, leafy pattern and its cool but brightly vivid colours all set against a bright white backdrop radiate the vibrant joy of summer, balanced with cool tones like blue dont have to be a downer, as this beautifully bright roller blind proves perfectly.

products.title: Scandi Sprig, Tangerine - Roman Blind
products.description: Palest stone grey plays host to the main event in the scandi sprig tangerine, which features sweet sprigs of foliage in a soft yet vibrant orange and stark, icy white. Cute and characterful, this pretty roman blind is sure to liven up any room in the house. Opt for a retro colour combination of orange and grey in your kitchen, selecting shiny orange units, appliances, and utensils, and keeping the walls, the flooring, and the work surfaces to charcoal and stone grey tones.

products.title: Scandi Birds, Kiwi - Roman Blind
products.description: Brighter and more vibrant than ever, the scandi birds collection is back, this time in the luscious kiwi edition. Slate grey birds, detailed with lime and white patterning, sit on a bed of dark, vibrant lime, forming an eye-catching design that is perfect for the modern family home. Adopt a cool and contemporary colour scheme in your kitchen, placing the kiwi against white walls and including dove grey units and matching lime tiling.

products.title: Scandi Sprig, Kiwi - Roman Blind
products.description: On a rich ochre base, the scandi sprig in kiwi places sweet sprigs of foliage in pale greys and off-whites, on brown grey stems. The look is pretty and festive, and the sweet illustrations are appealing to the eye. Craft a cheery palette in your kitchen by using the kiwi as your inspiration. Set it against white walls and grey kitchen units, accessorising with ochre tones in your appliances, utensils, and accessories.

products.title: Scandi Sprig, Noir - Roman Blind
products.description: Using a classic monochrome colour palette, the scandi sprig noir displays sweet sprigs of foliage in ice white and pale dove grey on a jet black background, resulting in a striking and unique aesthetic that's sure to draw the eye. Create a monochrome home study by including the noir along with pale grey or white walls and accessorising with black and white furniture in a contemporary style. Go for black and white photography for your wall art for a retro feel.

products.title: Scandi Birds, Mustard - Roman Blind
products.description: Incorporating the fashionable colour scheme of grey and yellow, the scandi birds in mustard is home to sweet birds in a two-tonal grey, with the deep yellow shade forming the base. The canvas fabric is lightweight and agile, so it forms the roman curves with ease. Settle for a trendy look in your living room by using the mustard to inspire a contemporary but cutesy vibe. Choose white or stone grey walls as a base, and match the sofas to the blinds, using soft grey upholstery or throws.
